verbose_text: The locus specific changes in histone H3 observed in the present study and the associated suppression of inflammatory gene transcription may be one of the mechanisms responsible for the inhibition of cytokine production by H 2 S. Histone acetylation is often related to the chromatin openness, as it weakens the charge attraction between histones and DNA, leading to the decondensation of chromatin, thereby facilitating gene transcription.
